data.title: Pizzeria Near Me - Geismar, LA - 13394 Highway 73
data.meta_description: Hungry for pizza? We're your local pizzeria in Geismar, LA. Order online today from Pizza Hut at 13394 Highway 73. No One OutPizzas the Hut®!
data.text: Hungry for a cheesy, fluffy, delicious pizza? Looking for a pizzeria near you in Geismar, LA? Whether you're craving a pepperoni, veggie, or just plain cheese slice, our pizzeria at 13394 Highway 73 has a fantastic selection of pies to choose from. Our mouth-watering pizza menu includes our most popular choices such as the Supreme Pizza, [Pepperoni Pizza](https://www.pizzahut.com/c/content/pepperoni-pizza), and the [Meat Lover's® Pizza](https://www.pizzahut.com/c/content/meat-lovers-pizza). Perhaps you're feeling a little adventurous? Why not try our Chicken-Bacon Parmesan Pizza or the Backyard BBQ Chicken Pizza. Our extensive menu also includes the [Buffalo Chicken Pizza](https://www.pizzahut.com/c/content/buffalo-chicken-pizza), Hawaiian Chicken Pizza, Veggie Lover's® Pizza, and Pizza Hut's very own Pepperoni Lover's® Pizza. You can also create your own pizza and choose from all the awesome ingredients and crusts on offer! To view our full menu at our 13394 Highway 73 location simply start your order on PizzaHut.com or call us at 2256738484.{br}{br}{br}{br}This Geismar pizzeria is not your typical everyday pizza joint. We're always innovating our 70734 menu. Try our awesome crusts, such as the [Original Stuffed Crust](https://www.pizzahut.com/c/content/stuffed-crust-pizza)® or the Thin 'N Crispy®. Load up your pizza with zesty marinara, melty cheese, and your choice of toppings like pepperoni, veggies, bacon, and more. Make sure to check out our [wings menu](https://www.pizzahut.com/menu/wings) if you feel like adding a side order of crispy-fried wings sauced to perfection with your pizza. Our extensive menu also includes an array of mouth-watering desserts, delicious sides, and classic drinks. With over 6,000 Pizza Hut restaurants throughout the US, there is usually a pizzeria nearby. Check out our [store locator](https://www.pizzahut.com/?local=delivery) to find more Pizza Hut restaurants in Geismar, LA, then order online and we'll get your piping-hot pizza ready in the oven.
